quotes.quote: Wanting something is not enough. You must hunger for it. Your motivation must be absolutely compelling in order to overcome the obstacles that will invariably come your way.
Hunger is sharper than the sword.

quotes.cite: Hunger is the handmaid of genius
quotes.quote: Hunger is the handmaid of genius.
Hunger is the best sauce in the world.
Hunger knows no friend but its feeder.
The hunger for love is much more difficult to remove than the hunger for bread.
Hunger is the best seasoning for meat.
Hunger steals the memory.
To hunger for use and to go unused is the worst hunger of all.
Hunger is the teacher of the arts, and the bestower of invention.
Hunger does not breed reform; it breeds madness, and all the ugly distempers that make an ordered life impossible.
Hunger is the mother of impatience and anger.
If you want to eliminate hunger, everybody has to be involved.
When we work to end childhood hunger, we are giving our love to kids who need it so much they will never ask for it.
Hunger makes a thief of any man.
The war against hunger is truly mankind's war of liberation.
Where there is hunger there is no hope. There is only desolation and pain. Hunger nurtures violence and fanaticism. A world where people starve will never be safe
When a poor person dies of hunger, it has not happened because God did not take care of him or her. It has happened because neither you nor I wanted to give that person what he or she needed.
If you take responsibility for yourself you will develop a hunger to accomplish your dreams.
Hunger of choice is a painful luxury; hunger of necessity is terrifying torture.
We have a hunger of the mind which asks for knowledge of all around us, and the more we gain, the more is our desire; the more we see, the more we are capable of seeing.
Hunger is the best pickle.
Hunger is insolent, and will be fed.
A healthful hunger for a great idea is the beauty and blessedness of life.
Can people who hunger so desperately for what other people have ever have enough?
The only remedy against hunger is reasonable birth control.
Take the feeling of hunger out of your gut, and you're no longer a champion.
Make hunger thy sauce, as a medicine for health.
The hunger to win must not die... The appetite has to remain big.
The hunger for facile wisdom is the root of all false philosophy.
There is a spiritual hunger in the world today - and it cannot be satisfied by better cars on longer credit terms.
Hunger eats through stone walls.
This hunger for profits causes great misery for the people.
Hunger also changes the world - when eating can't be a habit, then neither can seeing.
Hunger for gold is made greater as more gold is acquired.
Hunger's a great spur.
I find hunger more interesting than accomplishment.
I've always had a hunger for realizing myself through my career.
To hunger is to be alive and to hope.
Undoubtedly the desire for food has been, and still is, one of the main causes of great political events.
Where there is Hunger, Law is not regarded; and where Law is not regarded, there will be Hunger.
The real cause of hunger is the powerlessness of the poor to gain access to the resources they need to feed themselves
Can you still want something you already have? Absolutely. Everyday.
There's something to be said for hunger: at least it lets you know you're still alive.
Hunger quashes man's will to help his fellow man.
Bean could see the hunger in their eyes. Not the regular hunger, for food, but the real hunger, the deep hunger, for family, for love, for belonging.
Real hunger is when one man regards another man as something to eat.
Hunger: One of the few cravings that cannot be appeased with another solution.
Hunger is not only the best cook, but also the best physician.
There is hunger for ordinary bread, and there is hunger for love, for kindness, for thoughtfulness; and this is the great poverty that makes people suffer so much.
